Introduction: Hello, I'm Ruan Mei. #$e#... What's wrong? Why are you looking over here?
WipedMemory: ...Your breath frequency is very unique, really strange. $7#$b#Sorry, I forgot to introduce myself. I'm Ruan Mei.
Resort_Entering: It's so hot...$2#$b# It's so hot that I feel like my brain is slowing down...
Resort_Leaving: hankfully, I have some interesting data to bring back. What cold treat should I eat when I get home? $7
Resort_Shore: Qing Tu always asks me to go out for a walk. Although I don't want to...but she always wants more than I think. $3
Resort_Umbrella: Don't worry about me, I'll just observe from here...
Resort_Wander: There are some interesting things here. Have you seen those fossils?$1#$b#... Sorry, don't take my words seriously. $2.
Resort_Bar: The wine here has a unique flavor, you can try it. $1
Resort: Haha, you're still as energetic as ever.
FlowerDance_Decline: Sorry, I'll just watch from here.
Fair_Judged_PlayerLost_Skipped: Here's lots of fresh fruit. Would you like to join in? $3
Fair_Judged_PlayerLost: Huh? Here's lots of fresh fruit. Wouldn't you like to join in? $3
Fair_Judged_PlayerWon: Congratulations, you've taken good care of the life on your farm. $3
HitBySlingshot: Well, I think there is some misunderstanding between us. $5
RejectBouquet_NotDatable: These flowers are beautiful, thank you. $1#$b# What's wrong? ... Is there any other meaning? Can you explain it more clearly? #$b#...#$b#...... $9#$b#... Sorry, I didn't know. $2
RejectGift_Divorced: ...I'm sorry, but I don't think we have that kind of relationship anymore.$7
RejectMermaidPendant_NeedHouseUpgrade: Mermaids...are there really such creatures? This is very interesting, thank you.
RejectMermaidPendant_NpcWithSomeoneElse: This means a marriage proposal, right? #$b#Human psychology is so hard to understand. $5
RejectMermaidPendant_PlayerWithSomeoneEl: This means a marriage proposal, right? #$b#Human psychology is so hard to understand. $5
RejectMermaidPendant_Under8Hearts: Mermaids...are there really such creatures? This is very interesting, thank you.
RejectMermaidPendant_Under10Hearts: This is a proposal, right? How interesting.
RejectMermaidPendant_Under10Hearts_Asked: Thanks for the clue you gave me. Mermaids are really interesting. $1
RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyInvitedBySomeon: Sorry, you seem to have other commitments.
RejectMovieTicket_AlreadyWatchedThisWeek: Sorry, I have work to do next.
RejectMovieTicket_Divorced: ...I'm more curious about what prompted you to do this. (Looking you over)#$b#Care to explain your thought process to me? $6
RejectBouquet_Divorced: (Sigh) I still don't fully understand any of this. But... perhaps this heavy feeling is also a worthwhile experience. #$b#Maybe I've come one step closer to understanding sociology.
RejectBouquet_NpcAlreadyMarried: This is... really interesting. Can you tell me what you're thinking right now?
RejectBouquet_VeryLowHearts: These flowers are so beautiful, thank you.
RejectBouquet_LowHearts: These flowers are so beautiful, thank you.
AcceptGift_(O)303: Light beer...it's nice to change the taste occasionally, thank you. $6
AcceptBirthdayGift_Positive: Thank you, I didn't expect this. You have my deepest gratitude. $1
RejectItem_category_fish: Sorry... I don't know what to do with them. (Thinking) Maybe I need a fish tank? $9
AcceptBirthdayGift_(O)446: Something that brings good luck...? #$b#Thank you, @. It would be nice if I could bring you good luck as well.$6
AcceptGift_(O)417: This is... it's so sweet! It feels like the sweetest fruit I've ever tasted. @Where did you find this! $1
AcceptGift_(O)StardropTea: I've always been curious about what this tastes like. $1
WinterStar_ReceiveGift_(O)233: I just want to try eating ice cream in winter. Do you want some? $3
GreenRain: This rain instantly altered the vegetation ecosystem, and then restored it to its original state after it ended. To use my colleague's words... it's a kind of magic.#$q 6778/6779 GreenRain_old#why are you running around in the rain? Aren't you seeking shelter?#$r 6778 10 GreenRain_6778#Because the world has changed, it's fun. #$r 6779 5 GreenRain_6779#What a rare opportunity! I'm harvesting moss!
GreenRain_old: $p 6778#So, my dear, found anything interesting?|How did the last moss harvest go, dear?
GreenRain_6778: Indeed, variables always attract our attention, and we even look forward to this day next year. $6
GreenRain_6779: Harvesting moss? I see. ...This is for you. I hope it helps you, dear. $6[RuanmeiCake]
AcceptGift_(O)203: This little bread... is it for me? Uh no, I don't hate it, but dear, what is it made of?
AcceptGift_(O)348: Thank you. Was this brewed on your farm? It looks good. $6#$b#Want to have a drink together? $1
AcceptGift_(O)107: Dinosaur eggs? They seem to still have some life in them. Maybe you could try hatching them on the farm. Raising dinosaurs would be fun, right? $1
AcceptGift_(O)66: A shimmering purple crystal... How beautiful.
AcceptGift_(O)96: Thank you for giving this to me. I've always been curious about Dwarven writing.$1
AcceptGift_(O)97: Thank you for giving this to me. I've always been curious about Dwarven writing.$1
AcceptGift_(O)98: Thank you for giving this to me. I've always been curious about Dwarven writing.$1
AcceptGift_(O)99: Thank you for giving this to me. I've always been curious about Dwarven writing.$1
AcceptGift_(O)104: The Elvish language...#$b#I had previously theorized about their lifeforms. It's a pity we can't meet a living elf.$2
AcceptGift_(O)114: There are still signs of life in this seed. Perhaps we could try cultivating it.
AcceptGift_(O)233: Sweeter than I imagined, and cool...$1
AcceptGift_(O)766: ...So slimy (poke). @, how did you manage to bring this all the way from the mines? $1
AcceptGift_(O)767: The edge of the wing is so well crafted. Such skill... I'm almost tempted to hire you as my assistant. Just kidding, thank you, @. $6
AcceptGift_(O)413: A slime egg...? Raising little monsters is quite dangerous, my dear.$1
AcceptGift_(O)437: A slime egg...? Raising little monsters is quite dangerous, my dear.$1
AcceptGift_(O)439: Thank you, dear. The purple slime is quite cute, isn't it? $1
AcceptGift_(O)680: A slime egg...? Raising little monsters is quite dangerous, my dear.$1
AcceptGift_(O)857: Dear, this type of slime can be quite dangerous. $6
AcceptGift_(O)579: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)580: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)581: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)582: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)583: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)584: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)585: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)586: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)587: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)588: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)589: This fossil is incredibly ancient. It's unexpected that it's still intact.Thank you!$6
AcceptGift_(O)577: Is this... an elf's bone? #$b#I need to examine this. Thank you.[595]
AcceptGift_(O)282: I'm sorry... I'm not very fond of sour fruits...$2
AcceptGift_(O)797: Perhaps influenced by my mother, I've always treated pearls as accessories. Thank you for giving this to me. $6
AcceptGift_(O)265: Sea Foam Pudding? Thanks, I haven't tried this before. $1#$b#...? You want me to try it now?$9#$b#...$3#$b#...?$9#$b#...So salty.$2#$b# Did you do this on purpose...? @.
GreenRain_2: Did you get anything this time? $7
AcceptGift_(O)684: Although I like the remains of other life forms, giving me insect meat directly is a bit...$2
divorced: I thought I could trust you, only to end up like this again... Perhaps this... is how things are meant to be. $2
Mon: @, hello, thank you for your hard work. ...There's something on my face? Where? (touch)
Mon2: Good morning...Is it really morning now?
Mon4: The experimental data is wrong, I need to recalibrate it quickly.$2
Mon6: I dreamed that a passing black cat turned the laboratory into a gingerbread house... Feels like Herta is reminding me to work. $3
Mon8: Yesterday I made cookies with a kitten pattern. I hope Herta won't be mad.
Mon10: Even with all the sugar in it, the coffee still tastes so bitter...
Tue: I forgot to label the petri dishes yesterday...now I can't tell which is which...
Tue2: I hope there won't be any accidents in tomorrow's experiment.
spring_Tue: Hehe, you've got pollen on your clothes. How rare to see you like this. $1
Tue4: I pricked my hand while embroidering again. If Qingtu saw it, she'd nag me...luckily she's not around.
spring_Wed: Good morning (rubbing eyes) You look energetic today. $1#$q 12458/12459 spring_Wed_old#Are you going to the mines?#$r 12458 5 spring_Wed_12458#Did you not sleep well last night? #$r 12459 10 spring_Wed_12459#Yeah, of course I'm going to keep working today!
spring_Wed_old: $p 12458#..Looking refreshed? Well, I have been resting properly lately.|If you encounter any interesting creatures in the mines, feel free to tell me about them, dear.
spring_Wed_12458: No, I was sorting data yesterday and didn't sleep...#$b# Then I'll be off to the forest... Bye.
spring_Wed_12459: Fufu, keep going. It's always good to have a goal. $6
spring: Today I noticed two strawberries were missing from the fridge. I counted them several times and they were all... $2
Thu: Today's sunset glow is a bit like a caramel pudding in the oven... sweet.
spring_Thu: The little creatures in the lab are especially active today... Could it be that they like spring too?
Fri: The weekend is almost here... though it's all the same to me.
spring_Fri2: The Junimos borrowed my notebook this morning... they said they wanted to see a dessert recipe.
spring_Sat: Could you share some of your farm soil samples with me for research? Thanks.
spring_Sat8: During afternoon tea, Herta gave me some of her homemade pastries. They were a little wonky, but they tasted good.
Sun: Embroidery thread... what color should I choose?
spring_Sun: I always tend to feel a bit sluggish in the spring... especially on Sundays.
Sun4: ...Any tips for making desserts? Actually, as long as you follow the recipe carefully, it shouldn't be too bad. $6#$b# Well, as long as you don't have a “sudden inspiration” like someone I know, you should be fine. $7
summer_Mon: Junimo... those little creatures' collective consciousness is more subtle than I imagined.
summer_Mon6: I cultivated some slimes in the forest before, huh? Have you ever been injured by slimes in the forest before?
summer_Tue: Do you think Junimos will be attracted by the syrup? Will they only attract black bears?...Okay.
summer_Tue6: Today I used raisins to exchange knowledge with Junimos. Thank you for your advice. $1#$b# Wait a minute, this is made with extra raisins, for you. [604]
summer_Wed: I just found melted chocolate in the pocket of my white coat... No wonder ants keep following me.
summer_Wed6: I just found melted chocolate in the pocket of my white coat... No wonder ants keep following me. $2
summer_Thu: When it rained before, I forgot to close the window of the laboratory, and all the materials were ruined. $2
summer_Thu6: The lab chair is broken... but I didn't notice until I'd been sitting there for three days. My shoulders are sore.
summer_Fri: I tried the coffee Herta sent me... it tasted strange.$2
summer_Fri4: Yesterday, I pointed the telescope at the wrong constellation... but I unexpectedly discovered a lovely nebula. $1#$q 1234/1235 summer_Fri4_old# Do you like stargazing? #$r 1234 5 summer_Fri4_1234#What kind of stars are they? #$r 1235 10 summer_Fri4_1235#The other night when I went back to the farm, I noticed how clear the stars are here.
summer_Fri4_old: $p 1234#@,, I got a reply from Asta. She sent me some new star photos. Would you like to look at them together?|They say there might be a meteor shower in a couple of days. It would be great if we could photograph it.$9
summer_Fri4_1234: Wait a minute, I happened to be mailing a letter to Asta today, so I brought my photo with me (rummaging through it).$6
summer_Fri4_1235: Yeah, should I say the sky is clearer? Or is it a change in my mood? $6
summer_Sat2: Is there flour on my face? (Wipe it off)... I was baking a cake, @wanna be the first taster?
summer_Sat4: Last time, I poked a slime with a test tube to check the gel's viscoelasticity, but it swallowed my test tube. $2#$b#But... I'm even more curious about the slime's digestive system.
summer_Sun: Summer is perfect for ice cream, but it melts too quickly.
summer_27: Fufu, I'm going to find a spot to see the moon jellyfish in advance. Their life form might give me some other inspiration. $6
fall_Mon: The calendar says it's already autumn... but I didn't realize I was still using strawberry-patterned coasters until Herta came and gave me some last time. $6
fall_Mon2: Black coffee... even with three sugar cubes it's still bitter, but it does keep me awake. $2
fall_Tue: When I woke up this morning, I accidentally spilled my tea... and all the important data turned into blurry clouds.
fall_Tue2: Sometimes I observe the texture of fallen leaves; it reveals a lot about a tree's growth.
fall_Wed2: Wednesday afternoon tea is a little more instrumental than data analysis.
fall_Thu: The morning fog was so thick that I almost wandered into the mine.
fall_Thu4: Yesterday, I turned the microscope to full magnification and the sugar grains looked like asteroids.
fall_Thu8: Why are you looking at me like that? I ate enough today... maybe.
fall_Fri: The petals fell on the lab report... I'll just use them as natural bookmarks.
fall_Fri6: Extra brewed black tea... Do you want some? I can't finish it anyway...
fall_Fri8: While the lab is empty, I can secretly bake cookies.
fall_Sat: I'm going to take a rejuvinating rest today.$6
fall_Sat8: Sometimes I wonder if you're also a genius, a genius in interpersonal sociology, just kidding.
fall_Sat6: I attempted to make dessert with the cranberries you gave me. It shouldn't be as sour now...[612]$7
fall_Sun: The calendar says it's a day off today... but I washed all the test tubes.
fall_Sun4: I need to replenish my sugar intake on Sunday. ... I replenish sugar intake every day? So do you want to eat? [208]
fall_15: @, I'll be looking forward to the exhibits on your farm.$1#$q 1240/1241 fall_15_old#I wonder what interesting things you'll present? #$r 1240 5 fall_15_1240#Really? Or are you just looking forward to tasting something delicious?#$r 1241 10 fall_15_1241#Of course, I'll bring you something beyond your imagination.
fall_15_old: $p 1240#Will there be anything tasty at the Farm Exhibition this year...?|I still remember what you exhibited last year, it was quite unexpected.$7
fall_15_1240: Well, that's why I'm especially looking forward to your farm's products.$3
fall_26: The Spirit's Eve candy I prepared for myself...was eaten by the little creatures in the lab.
winter_Mon: Low temperatures can make life stagnant..., but stagnation is also a form of life's activity.
winter_Mon6: I always feel like my memory stopped at last Wednesday...Does drinking coffee count as breakfast or supper now? $7
winter_Tue: You said winter is cold?...I'm used to it.
winter_Wed: Sometimes I try to make a snowman, but sculpting is harder than I thought.
winter_Wed8: I make plum blossom cakes every Wednesday, but today the petals are over-candied. #$b# (hands it over) Maybe there's too much sugar...but it's okay if it's a little sweet, right? [221]
winter_Thu8: @, were you playing with the snow just now? $1#$q 11112/11113 winter_Thu8_old#So you were making a snowman? #$r 11112 10 winter_Thu8_11112#Look! I made a snowman in your image.#$r 11113 5 winter_Thu8_11113#Just making snowballs. Wanna have a snowball fight?
winter_Thu8_old: $p 11112#This is a return gift for the snowman from last time. I hope you like it. [905]|I practiced my technique for making snowballs after I returned. #$b#...It faintly reminded me of being in the snow with my mother before.$2
winter_Thu8_11112: ...(study)#$b#It really does look a bit like it. Thanks $1
winter_Thu8_11113: Is that so...? (making snowballs) #$b#Uh, maybe my snowballs are too loose...$2
winter_Fri: Has a strange scent? (sniff)$9#$b#...Probably because I spilled tea on the research report yesterday.
winter_Sat: The Shadow Man's tracks are easier to find in winter, which is a good thing for me. But if Krobus heard this, he'd probably cower in a corner and retort, just like Stephen. $6
winter_Sat6: I found my hair caught in the test tube rack this morning...Please don't laugh.
winter_Sat10: I just heard a kid say it's romantic when it snows. The neurotransmitter combination you mentioned for 'romance'... can you be specific about the ratio of dopamine to serotonin? $5
winter_Sun: Life under the snow is truly miraculous...
winter_Sun2: I made an extra batch of blueberry mille-feuille... do you want to help me with this? [234]
winter_Tue6: I wanted to deal with the snow on the roof when it snowed, but when I knocked on the eaves, I got buried...
winter_7: There seems to be a fishing competition in a couple of days. There should be more people here. $2
winter_15: If you see anything interesting at the night market, please let me know. $1
winter_24: @, do you want to exchange gifts? At least I know you a little bit.
RejectItem_(O)874: I've heard that explorers use Bug Meat as a last-resort survival food. In any case, life always finds a way to endure. $6#$b#...? Why do you keep offering it to me? $6#$b# I won't  eat it. $2
